trans-unit.source: Create a custom virtual machine running Windows in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a custom virtual machine running Windows in Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn to create a custom virtual machine running Windows in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn to create a custom virtual machine running Windows in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Create a custom virtual machine running Windows in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a custom virtual machine running Windows in Azure

trans-unit.source: A custom virtual machine simply means a virtual machine you create using the From Gallery option because it gives you more configuration choices than the Quick Create option.
trans-unit.target: A custom virtual machine simply means a virtual machine you create using the From Gallery option because it gives you more configuration choices than the Quick Create option.

trans-unit.source: Connecting the virtual machine to a virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Connecting the virtual machine to a virtual network.

trans-unit.source: Installing the VM Agent and extensions, such as for antimalware.
trans-unit.target: Installing the VM Agent and extensions, such as for antimalware.

trans-unit.source: Adding the virtual machine to an existing cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Adding the virtual machine to an existing cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Adding the virtual machine to an existing storage account.
trans-unit.target: Adding the virtual machine to an existing storage account.

trans-unit.source: Adding the virtual machine to an availability set.
trans-unit.target: Adding the virtual machine to an availability set.

trans-unit.source: If you want your virtual machine to use a virtual network so you can connect to it directly by hostname or set up cross-premises connections, make sure you specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: If you want your virtual machine to use a virtual network so you can connect to it directly by hostname or set up cross-premises connections, make sure you specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine can be configured to join a virtual network only when you create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: A virtual machine can be configured to join a virtual network only when you create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: For details on virtual networks, see <link><linkText>Azure Virtual Network Overview</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For details on virtual networks, see <link><linkText>Azure Virtual Network Overview</linkText><title></title></link>.
